00034     [Serializable]
00035     public class Histogram
00036     {
00040         ArrayList buckets;
00041 
00046         bool areBucketsSorted;
00047 
00051         public Histogram()
00052         {
00053             buckets = new ArrayList();
00054             areBucketsSorted = true;
00055         }
00056 
00060         public void Add(Bucket bucket)
00061         {
00062             buckets.Add(bucket);
00063             areBucketsSorted = false;
00064         }
00065 
00069         public Bucket GetContainerOf(double v)
00070         {
00071             LazySort();
00072             return (Bucket)buckets[buckets.BinarySearch(v, Bucket.DefaultPointComparer)];
00073         }
00074 
00079         public int GetContainerIndexOf(double v)
00080         {
00081             LazySort();
00082             int index = buckets.BinarySearch(v, Bucket.DefaultPointComparer);
00083 
00084             if(index < 0)
00085             {
00086                 throw new ArgumentException(string.Format(Resources.ArgumentHistogramContainsNot, v));
00087             }
00088 
00089             return index;
00090         }
00091 
00095         public void JoinBuckets()
00096         {
00097             if(buckets.Count == 0)
00098             {
00099                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.InvalidOperationHistogramEmpty);
00100             }
00101 
00102             LazySort();
00103             for(int i = 0; i < buckets.Count - 2; i++)
00104             {
00105                 double middle = (((Bucket)buckets[i]).UpperBound
00106                     + ((Bucket)buckets[i + 1]).LowerBound) / 2;
00107 
00108                 ((Bucket)buckets[i]).UpperBound = middle;
00109                 ((Bucket)buckets[i + 1]).LowerBound = middle;
00110             }
00111         }
00112 
00113         private void LazySort()
00114         {
00115             if(!areBucketsSorted)
00116             {
00117                 buckets.Sort();
00118                 areBucketsSorted = true;
00119             }
00120         }
00121 
00125         public void Sort()
00126         {
00127             buckets.Sort();
00128         }
00129 
00133         public Bucket this[int index]
00134         {
00135             get
00136             {
00137                 LazySort();
00138                 return (Bucket)buckets[index];
00139             }
00140 
00141             set
00142             {
00143                 LazySort();
00144                 buckets[index] = value;
00145             }
00146         }
00147 
00151         public int Count
00152         {
00153             get { return buckets.Count; }
00154         }
00155 
00159         public double TotalDepth
00160         {
00161             get
00162             {
00163                 double totalDepth = 0;
00164                 for(int i = 0; i < this.Count; i++)
00165                 {
00166                     totalDepth += this[i].Depth;
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 return totalDepth;
00170             }
00171         }
00172 
00176         public override string ToString()
00177         {
00178             StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00179             foreach(Bucket b in buckets)
00180             {
00181                 sb.Append(b.ToString());
00182             }
00183 
00184             return sb.ToString();
00185         }

00190         public static Histogram OptimalDispersion(int bucketCount, ICollection distribution)
00191         {
00192             if(distribution.Count < Math.Max(bucketCount, 2))
00193             {
00194                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.InvalidOperationHistogramNotEnoughPoints);
00195             }
00196 
00197             // "values" contains the sorted distribution.
00198             double[] values = new double[distribution.Count];
00199             distribution.CopyTo(values, 0);
00200             Array.Sort(values);
00201 
00202             // 'optimalCost[i,k]' contains the optimal costs for an
00203             // histogram with the 'i+1' first values and 'k' buckets.
00204             double[,] optimalCost = new double[values.Length, bucketCount];
00205 
00206             // 'lastBucketIndex[i,k]' contains the index of the first
00207             // value of the last bucket for optimal histogram comprising
00208             // the 'i+1' first values and 'k' buckets.
00209             int[,] lastBucketIndex = new int[values.Length, bucketCount];
00210 
00211             // 'prefixSum[i]' contains the sum of the 'i-1' first values.
00212             double[] prefixSum = new double[values.Length + 1];
00213 
00214             // Initialization of the prefix sums
00215             for(int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)
00216             {
00217                 prefixSum[i + 1] = prefixSum[i] + values[i];
00218             }
00219 
00220             // "One bucket" histograms initialization
00221             for(int i = 0, avg = 0; i < values.Length; i++)
00222             {
00223                 while((avg + 1) < values.Length &&
00224                     values[avg + 1] < prefixSum[i + 1] / (i + 1))
00225                 {
00226                     avg++;
00227                 }
00228 
00229                 optimalCost[i, 0] =
00230                     prefixSum[i + 1] - 2 * prefixSum[avg + 1]
00231                     + (2 * avg - i + 1) * (prefixSum[i + 1] / (i + 1));
00232             }
00233 
00234             // "One value per bucket" histograms initialization
00235             for(int k = 0; k < bucketCount; k++)
00236             {
00237                 // optimalCost[k, k] = 0;
00238                 lastBucketIndex[k, k] = k;
00239             }
00240 
00241             // ----- Dynamic programming part -----
00242 
00243             // Loop on the number of buckets 
00244             // (note that there are 'k+1' buckets)
00245             for(int k = 1; k < bucketCount; k++)
00246             {
00247                 // Loop on the number of considered values
00248                 // (note that there are 'i+1' considered values)
00249                 for(int i = k; i < values.Length; i++)
00250                 {
00251                     optimalCost[i, k] = double.PositiveInfinity;
00252 
00253                     // Loop for finding the optimal boundary of the last bucket
00254                     // ('j+1' is the index of the first value in the last bucket)
00255                     for(int j = (k - 1), avg = (k - 1); j < i; j++)
00256                     {
00257                         while((avg + 1) < values.Length &&
00258                             values[avg + 1] < (prefixSum[i + 1] - prefixSum[j + 1]) / (i - j))
00259                         {
00260                             avg++;
00261                         }
00262 
00263                         double currentCost = optimalCost[j, k - 1] +
00264                             prefixSum[i + 1] + prefixSum[j + 1] - 2 * prefixSum[avg + 1]
00265                             + (2 * avg - i - j) * (prefixSum[i + 1] - prefixSum[j + 1]) / (i - j);
00266 
00267                         if(currentCost < optimalCost[i, k])
00268                         {
00269                             optimalCost[i, k] = currentCost;
00270                             lastBucketIndex[i, k] = j + 1;
00271                         }
00272                     }
00273                 }
00274             }
00275 
00276             // ----- Reconstitution of the histogram -----
00277             Histogram histogram = new Histogram();
00278             int index = values.Length - 1;
00279             for(int k = (bucketCount - 1); k >= 0; k--)
00280             {
00281                 histogram.Add(new Bucket(
00282                     values[lastBucketIndex[index, k]],
00283                     values[index],
00284                     index - lastBucketIndex[index, k] + 1
00285                     ));
00286 
00287                 index = lastBucketIndex[index, k] - 1;
00288             }
00289 
00290             return histogram;
00291         }
00292

00301         public static Histogram OptimalVariance(int bucketCount, ICollection distribution)
00302         {
00303             if(distribution.Count < bucketCount)
00304             {
00305                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.InvalidOperationHistogramNotEnoughPoints);
00306             }
00307 
00308             // "values" contains the sorted distribution.
00309             double[] values = new double[distribution.Count];
00310             distribution.CopyTo(values, 0);
00311             Array.Sort(values);
00312 
00313             // 'optimalCost[i,k]' contains the optimal costs for an
00314             // histogram with the 'i+1' first values and 'k' buckets.
00315             double[,] optimalCost = new double[values.Length, bucketCount];
00316 
00317             // 'lastBucketIndex[i,k]' contains the index of the first
00318             // value of the last bucket for optimal histogram comprising
00319             // the 'i+1' first values and 'k' buckets.
00320             int[,] lastBucketIndex = new int[values.Length, bucketCount];
00321 
00322             // 'prefixSum[i]' contains the sum of the 'i-1' first values.
00323             double[] prefixSum = new double[values.Length + 1];
00324 
00325             // 'sqPrefixSum' contains the sum of the 'i-1' first squared values.
00326             double[] sqPrefixSum = new double[values.Length + 1];
00327 
00328             // Initialization of the prefix sums
00329             for(int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)
00330             {
00331                 prefixSum[i + 1] = prefixSum[i] + values[i];
00332                 sqPrefixSum[i + 1] = sqPrefixSum[i] + values[i] * values[i];
00333             }
00334 
00335             // "One bucket" histograms initialization
00336             for(int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)
00337             {
00338                 optimalCost[i, 0] = sqPrefixSum[i + 1] -
00339                     prefixSum[i + 1] * prefixSum[i + 1] / (i + 1);
00340             }
00341 
00342             // "One value per bucket" histograms initialization
00343             for(int k = 0; k < bucketCount; k++)
00344             {
00345                 // optimalCost[k, k] = 0;
00346                 lastBucketIndex[k, k] = k;
00347             }
00348 
00349             // ----- Dynamic programming part -----
00350 
00351             // Loop on the number of buckets 
00352             // (note that there are 'k+1' buckets)
00353             for(int k = 1; k < bucketCount; k++)
00354             {
00355                 // Loop on the number of considered values
00356                 // (note that there are 'i+1' considered values)
00357                 for(int i = k; i < values.Length; i++)
00358                 {
00359                     optimalCost[i, k] = double.PositiveInfinity;
00360 
00361                     // Loop for finding the optimal boundary of the last bucket
00362                     // ('j+1' is the index of the first value in the last bucket)
00363                     for(int j = (k - 1); j < i; j++)
00364                     {
00365                         double currentCost = optimalCost[j, k - 1] + sqPrefixSum[i + 1] - sqPrefixSum[j + 1]
00366                             - (prefixSum[i + 1] - prefixSum[j + 1]) * (prefixSum[i + 1] - prefixSum[j + 1]) / (i - j);
00367 
00368                         if(currentCost < optimalCost[i, k])
00369                         {
00370                             optimalCost[i, k] = currentCost;
00371                             lastBucketIndex[i, k] = j + 1;
00372                         }
00373                     }
00374                 }
00375             }
00376 
00377             // ----- Reconstitution of the histogram -----
00378             Histogram histogram = new Histogram();
00379             int index = values.Length - 1;
00380             for(int k = (bucketCount - 1); k >= 0; k--)
00381             {
00382                 histogram.Add(new Bucket(
00383                     values[lastBucketIndex[index, k]],
00384                     values[index],
00385                     index - lastBucketIndex[index, k] + 1
00386                     ));
00387 
00388                 index = lastBucketIndex[index, k] - 1;
00389             }
00390 
00391             return histogram;
00392         }
00393 
00397         public static Histogram OptimalFreedom(int bucketCount, ICollection distribution)
00398         {
00399             if(distribution.Count < Math.Max(bucketCount, 2))
00400             {
00401                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.InvalidOperationHistogramNotEnoughPoints);
00402             }
00403 
00404             // "values" contains the sorted distribution.
00405             double[] values = new double[distribution.Count];
00406             distribution.CopyTo(values, 0);
00407             Array.Sort(values);
00408 
00409             // 'optimalCost[i,k]' contains the optimal costs for an
00410             // histogram with the 'i+1' first values and 'k' buckets.
00411             double[,] optimalCost = new double[values.Length, bucketCount];
00412 
00413             // 'lastBucketIndex[i,k]' contains the index of the first
00414             // value of the last bucket for optimal histogram comprising
00415             // the 'i+1' first values and 'k' buckets.
00416             int[,] lastBucketIndex = new int[values.Length, bucketCount];
00417 
00418             // "One bucket" histograms initialization
00419             for(int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)
00420             {
00421                 optimalCost[i, 0] = (values[i] - values[0]) * (i + 1);
00422             }
00423 
00424             // "One value per bucket" histograms initialization
00425             for(int k = 0; k < bucketCount; k++)
00426             {
00427                 // optimalCost[k, k] = 0;
00428                 lastBucketIndex[k, k] = k;
00429             }
00430 
00431             // ----- Dynamic programming part -----
00432 
00433             // Loop on the number of buckets 
00434             // (note that there are 'k+1' buckets)
00435             for(int k = 1; k < bucketCount; k++)
00436             {
00437                 // Loop on the number of considered values
00438                 // (note that there are 'i+1' considered values)
00439                 for(int i = k; i < values.Length; i++)
00440                 {
00441                     optimalCost[i, k] = double.PositiveInfinity;
00442 
00443                     // Loop for finding the optimal boundary of the last bucket
00444                     // ('j+1' is the index of the first value in the last bucket)
00445                     for(int j = (k - 1), avg = (k - 1); j < i; j++)
00446                     {
00447                         double currentCost = optimalCost[j, k - 1] +
00448                             (values[i] - values[j + 1]) * (i - j);
00449 
00450                         if(currentCost < optimalCost[i, k])
00451                         {
00452                             optimalCost[i, k] = currentCost;
00453                             lastBucketIndex[i, k] = j + 1;
00454                         }
00455                     }
00456                 }
00457             }
00458 
00459             // ----- Reconstitution of the histogram -----
00460             Histogram histogram = new Histogram();
00461             int index = values.Length - 1;
00462             for(int k = (bucketCount - 1); k >= 0; k--)
00463             {
00464                 histogram.Add(new Bucket(
00465                     values[lastBucketIndex[index, k]],
00466                     values[index],
00467                     index - lastBucketIndex[index, k] + 1
00468                     ));
00469 
00470                 index = lastBucketIndex[index, k] - 1;
00471             }
00472 
00473             return histogram;
00474         }

00479         public static Histogram OptimalSquaredFreedom(int histSize, ICollection distribution)
00480         {
00481             if(distribution.Count < Math.Max(histSize, 2))
00482             {
00483                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.InvalidOperationHistogramNotEnoughPoints);
00484             }
00485 
00486             // "values" contains the sorted distribution.
00487             double[] values = new double[distribution.Count];
00488             distribution.CopyTo(values, 0);
00489             Array.Sort(values);
00490 
00491             // 'optimalCost[i,k]' contains the optimal costs for an
00492             // histogram with the 'i+1' first values and 'k' buckets.
00493             double[,] optimalCost = new double[values.Length, histSize];
00494 
00495             // 'lastBucketIndex[i,k]' contains the index of the first
00496             // value of the last bucket for optimal histogram comprising
00497             // the 'i+1' first values and 'k' buckets.
00498             int[,] lastBucketIndex = new int[values.Length, histSize];
00499 
00500             // "One bucket" histograms initialization
00501             for(int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)
00502             {
00503                 optimalCost[i, 0] =
00504                     (values[i] - values[0]) * (values[i] - values[0]) * (i + 1);
00505             }
00506 
00507             // "One value per bucket" histograms initialization
00508             for(int k = 0; k < histSize; k++)
00509             {
00510                 // optimalCost[k, k] = 0;
00511                 lastBucketIndex[k, k] = k;
00512             }
00513 
00514             // ----- Dynamic programming part -----
00515 
00516             // Loop on the number of buckets 
00517             // (note that there are 'k+1' buckets)
00518             for(int k = 1; k < histSize; k++)
00519             {
00520                 // Loop on the number of considered values
00521                 // (note that there are 'i+1' considered values)
00522                 for(int i = k; i < values.Length; i++)
00523                 {
00524                     optimalCost[i, k] = double.PositiveInfinity;
00525 
00526                     // Loop for finding the optimal boundary of the last bucket
00527                     // ('j+1' is the index of the first value in the last bucket)
00528                     for(int j = (k - 1), avg = (k - 1); j < i; j++)
00529                     {
00530                         double currentCost = optimalCost[j, k - 1] +
00531                             (values[i] - values[j + 1]) * (values[i] - values[j + 1]) * (i - j);
00532 
00533                         if(currentCost < optimalCost[i, k])
00534                         {
00535                             optimalCost[i, k] = currentCost;
00536                             lastBucketIndex[i, k] = j + 1;
00537                         }
00538                     }
00539                 }
00540             }
00541 
00542             // ----- Reconstitution of the histogram -----
00543             Histogram histogram = new Histogram();
00544             int index = values.Length - 1;
00545             for(int k = (histSize - 1); k >= 0; k--)
00546             {
00547                 histogram.Add(new Bucket(
00548                     values[lastBucketIndex[index, k]],
00549                     values[index],
00550                     index - lastBucketIndex[index, k] + 1
00551                     ));
00552 
00553                 index = lastBucketIndex[index, k] - 1;
00554             }
00555 
00556             return histogram;
00557         }
00558     }
00559 
00564     [Serializable]
00565     public class Bucket : IComparable, ICloneable
00566     {
00571         private sealed class PointComparer : IComparer
00572         {
00576             public int Compare(object obj1, object obj2)
00577             {
00578                 Bucket bucket = null;
00579                 double val = 0;
00580                 int unit = 0;
00581 
00582                 if(obj1 is Bucket)
00583                 {
00584                     bucket = (Bucket)obj1;
00585                     val = (double)obj2;
00586                     unit = 1;
00587                 }
00588                 else
00589                 {
00590                     bucket = (Bucket)obj2;
00591                     val = (double)obj1;
00592                     unit = -1;
00593                 }
00594 
00595                 if(bucket.upperBound < val)
00596                 {
00597                     return -unit;
00598                 }
00599 
00600                 if(bucket.lowerBound <= val)
00601                 {
00602                     return 0;
00603                 }
00604 
00605                 return unit;
00606             }
00607         }
00608 
00609         static PointComparer pointComparer = new PointComparer();
00610 
00612         double lowerBound;
00613 
00615         double upperBound;
00616 
00618         double depth;
00619 
00623         public Bucket(double lowerBound, double upperBound)
00624         {
00625             Debug.Assert(
00626                 lowerBound <= upperBound,
00627                 "lowerBound should be smaller than the upperBound."
00628                 );
00629 
00630             this.lowerBound = lowerBound;
00631             this.upperBound = upperBound;
00632         }
00633 
00637         public Bucket(double lowerBound, double upperBound, double depth)
00638         {
00639             this.lowerBound = lowerBound;
00640             this.upperBound = upperBound;
00641             this.depth = depth;
00642         }
00643 
00647         private Bucket(Bucket bucket)
00648         {
00649             this.lowerBound = bucket.lowerBound;
00650             this.upperBound = bucket.upperBound;
00651             this.depth = bucket.depth;
00652         }
00653 
00657         public double LowerBound
00658         {
00659             get { return lowerBound; }
00660             set { lowerBound = value; }
00661         }
00662 
00666         public double UpperBound
00667         {
00668             get { return upperBound; }
00669             set { upperBound = value; }
00670         }
00671 
00675         public double Width
00676         {
00677             get { return upperBound - lowerBound; }
00678         }
00679 
00683         public double Depth
00684         {
00685             get { return depth; }
00686             set { depth = value; }
00687         }
00688 
00692         public static IComparer DefaultPointComparer
00693         {
00694             get { return pointComparer; }
00695         }
00696 
00700         public int CompareTo(object bkt)
00701         {
00702             Bucket bucket = (Bucket)bkt;
00703 
00704             Debug.Assert(
00705                 this.upperBound <= bucket.lowerBound
00706                 || this.lowerBound >= bucket.upperBound,
00707                 "Could not compare two intersecting buckets."
00708                 );
00709 
00710             if(Number.AlmostZero(this.Width) && Number.AlmostZero(bucket.Width)
00711                 && Number.AlmostEqual(this.lowerBound, bucket.lowerBound))
00712             {
00713                 return 0;
00714             }
00715 
00716             if(bucket.upperBound - this.lowerBound <= 0)
00717             {
00718                 return 1;
00719             }
00720 
00721             return -1;
00722         }
00723 
00727         public object Clone()
00728         {
00729             return new Bucket(this);
00730         }
00731 
00735         public override bool Equals(object obj)
00736         {
00737             if(!(obj is Bucket))
00738             {
00739                 return false;
00740             }
00741 
00742             Bucket b = (Bucket)obj;
00743             return Number.AlmostEqual(this.lowerBound, b.lowerBound)
00744                 && Number.AlmostEqual(this.upperBound, b.upperBound)
00745                 && Number.AlmostEqual(this.depth, b.depth);
00746         }
00747 
00751         public override int GetHashCode()
00752         {
00753             return lowerBound.GetHashCode()
00754                 ^ upperBound.GetHashCode()
00755                 ^ depth.GetHashCode();
00756         }
00757 
00762         public override string ToString()
00763         {
00764             return "[" + this.lowerBound + ";" + this.upperBound + "]";
00765         }
00766     }
